Step 2: Start at the front of your hairline and work your way back.
Step 3: Leave the laser comb at the spot that needs attention.

entry.title: GlamLook‚Ñ¢ Clip On Fringe Hair Extension
entry.summary:
Vendor: BloomVenus
Type:
Price: 9.99

Product Description:

Have you ever envy those girls with beautiful fringe? But what is fringe, by the way? A fringe are strands or locks of hair that is longer, hitting either right above or along the brow line. If you have not tried having fringe before, due to the fear that it might not look good on you, well, we got your back! With GlamLook‚Ñ¢ Clip On Fringe Hair Extension, you can instantly get a natural-looking fringe without cutting off your hair.

This natural-looking fringe hair extension is made from heat resistant fiber that is able to resist the heat when using styling tools ‚Äî like you are just styling your own hair. Just be reminded that going over 350 degrees is not recommended.

If you feel like going out or partying with an instantly new hairstyle, which is with gorgeous bangs, simply wear this fringe hair extension and you're all set! In case the fringe is longer, to the point that it is already covering your view, you can cut the bangs to any length that you like in order to fit your face.¬†

You can also use a thick headband to cover the very start of the top of the fringe hair extension. This can also help keep the natural look of your fringe.

With GlamLook‚Ñ¢ Clip On Fringe Hair Extension, you will never have to go to a salon or watch video tutorials to have a perfect fringe for you can have a natural-looking one anytime you want! Just clip it on!

  • Easy to wear
  • Smooth hand feeling, like human hair
  • Easy to comb and style
  • Tangle-free and shedding-free
  • Fine elasticity and durability
  • Washable

How to Use:

Image

Step 1: Choose clip-in bangs that match your hair color.

Step 2: Cut the hair extension to any length that fits your face.

Step 3: Part your hair down the center.

Step 4: Secure the clips. Make sure to get the hair extension lay as flat as possible.

Step 5: Cover the edge of bangs with your hair. Style and enjoy it!

How to Care:

Step 1: When cleaning, you can use warm or cold water.

Step 2: Use shampoo and brush it carefully.

Step 3: Apply conditioner for a smoother and silkier texture.

Step 4: Rinse the facial cleanser thoroughly. You can use a styling gel or wet-look spray depending on your preference.

Step 5: After washing, brush the hair carefully from the bottom to the top, with downward movements until all the hair is combed through.

Step 6: Never start above or in the middle. Doing so could harm the hair and cause hair-splitting.¬†

Step 7: Only cold blow-dry to avoid hair from drying out.

Specifications:

Material: High-Grade Fiber

Type: Fringe Hair Extension

Bangs Length: 6 inches

Hair on Temples: 12 inches

Color: Plum Red, Medium Brown, Black, Ash Blonde with Bleach Blonde Highlights, Light Auburn with Bleach Blonde Highlight, Bleach Blonde, Light Brown with Bleach Blonde Highlight, Dark Brown, Brownish Black

Include:

1 x Fringe Hair Extension

Note:

The color of the product shown in the pictures may slightly vary from the actual item due to the differences in the monitor and light effect.

Please allow slight measuring deviation due to manual measurement.

entry.title: StylingQueen‚Ñ¢ 2-in-1 Straightening & Curling Ceramic Flat Iron
entry.summary:
Vendor: BloomVenus
Type:
Price: 79.99

Product Description:

Investing in our hair is indeed a good investment. Why? Hair is the only crown we wear that we never take off, so it is just a must to keep it always looking good and keeping it fresh!

However, why just settle with "good" investment when you can have the "best" with StylingQueen‚Ñ¢ 2-in-1¬† Straightening & Curling Ceramic Flat Iron?!


Play with your hair using this salon professional-grade flat iron with an intelligent temperature control system that adapts to all qualitative demand!

StylingQueen‚Ñ¢ 2-in-1¬† Straightening & Curling Ceramic Flat Iron combines crystal anionic coating and ceramic glaze technology to produce a large number of negative ions that eliminate frizz, repel humidity, locks hair color, keeps hair healthy and looks innate!

This versatile styling iron comes with curved plate edges that help you create revolutionary hairstyles instantly!

It is ultimately lightweight! Unlike those conventional flat irons in the market, StylingQueen‚Ñ¢ 2-in-1¬† Straightening & Curling Ceramic Flat Iron¬†ergonomic design allows you to move and style freely with minimal tension!

How to Use:

StylingQueen‚Ñ¢ 2-in-1¬† Straightening & Curling Ceramic Flat Iron is very easy to use and leaves long-lasting effects on your hair!

For Straight Hair

Step 1: Comb your hair to avoid knots

Step 2: Plug in the flat iron, press the power button then wait for at least 10 seconds

Step 3: Take a bunch of your hair on the flat iron and slide it down till it reaches the tip!

For Curly Hair

Step 1: Place a strand of your hair on the flat iron.

Step 2: Rotate your hair in 180 to 270 degrees

Step 3: Scroll down until the tip of hair becomes curly too or until achieving your desired hairstyle!

Specifications:

Color: Gold

Weight: 0.75 kg

Size: 34.5*11*7 cm

Power: 150W

Voltage: AC110-240V

Temperature: 150-230 degrees

Rated Voltage: 220V / 50Hz

1 x Flat Iron

entry.title: FlawlessSkin‚Ñ¢ IPL Laser Hair Remover
entry.summary:
Vendor: BloomVenus
Type:
Price: 115.99

Product Description:

FlawlessSkin‚Ñ¢ IPL Laser Hair Remover is an FDA approved laser hair removal product that can painlessly eliminate excess hair from the body!

GOLD STANDARD

This epilator is awarded as GOLD STANDARD for hair removal! It effectively eliminates excess hair but also PERMANENTLY removes undesired hair growth!

FlawlessSkin‚Ñ¢ 600000 Flash IPL Laser Hair Removal Epilator is an FDA approved laser hair removal product that can painlessly eliminate excess hair from the body!

600000 FLASHES!

It doubles the flashes a regular epilator produces! From 300,000 flashes, this one produces 600,000 flashes to perfectly treat large areas of the body!

70% - 90% HAIR REDUCTION!

Witness a significant decrease in hair reduction in your body with regular use!


Engineered for sensitive skin!

It is designed to treat any parts of your body including those sensitive areas such as the bikini zone and upper lip.

COMPLETELY PAINLESS

Unlike conventional hair removals such as waxing and plucking, this one is 100% PAIN-FREE AND SAFE!

Know the FAQs!

Does it really work?

This epilator has sold hundreds of thousands around the globe and trust by most women! Is it really work? ABSOLUTELY!


Is it Clinically Proven?

YES. It has passed numerous number of lab tests from respective Medical Labs and Universities.


Does it hurt?

It DOESN'T, however, the feeling can be described as a warm sensation on the skin.


How long will it take to see the results?

It INSTANTLY removes unwanted hair. Moreso, you be able to notice a decrease in your hair growth with regular use for 3 weeks, and for full results within 12 weeks!


Which is more convenient? Waxing, plucking, or this epilator?

Waxing and plucking only removes unwanted hair, but for PERMANENT and OPTIMAL result, this epilator should be your number one choice!

¬†

How to Use:

FlawlessSkin‚Ñ¢ IPL Laser Hair Remover¬†is easy to maneuver!

Step 1: Shave the areas you want to use the epilator with.
Step 2: Plug in the epilator and press the power button
Step 3: Slowly put the epilator to your desired area.

Treatment time:

For face: 2 minutes
For neck: 1 minute
For armpit: 1 minute
For arm: 3 minutes
For shoulder: 1 minute
For the back: 12 minutes
For the calf: 5 minutes
For thigh: 5 minutes
All body: 30 minutes

Specifications:

Material: ABS
Voltage: AC100-240v, 50/60Hz
Power: 36 watts
Pulse: 600,000
Hair Removal Area: 3-5J / cm2
Wavelength: 580-1200nm

Includes:

1 x User Manual

1 x Machine

1 x Packing Box

1 x Power Plug

A specially-made hairbrush that produces negative ions when activated by heat. It has double Ionic generator releasing more negative ionic that is excellent in taming and restoring frizzy, dry, and greasy hair.

  • Makes hair softer and shinier
  • Minimizes heat damage
  • Eliminate frizz

  • Has round end tip to prevent scalp damage
  • Has a sleek design that fits into the palm
  • Suits wet and dry hair
  • Convenient to use
  • Easy to clean

How to Use:

Step 1: Turn on the switch to actively release the negative ions from the brush.
Step 2: Softly brush your hair from scalp to hair tip. Repeat accordingly.
Step 3: After use, turn off the switch

entry.summary:

Don't you find it so demanding to style your hair every morning? You need to pat in with a towel, dry it using a blower and a comb, then straight it with an iron. So time-consuming!

Time to ditch all those hair essentials with CrowningGlory‚Ñ¢ 2-in-1 Hair Dryer & Volumizer!

This revolutionary product is a combination of a hairdryer and a styling comb that allows you to safely style your hair while drying using its ceramic coating and ion technology!

CrowningGlory‚Ñ¢ 2-in-1 Hair Dryer & Volumizer comes with 3 adjustable modes which can provide up to 1000W power! The Ceramic Coating protects your hair with even heat distribution while the Negative ions saturate airflow! The brush is solely made with Nylon Pin and Tufted Bristles to easily run your hair and avoids tangling!

In addition to saving so much of your time and effort, the plug comes with a leakage protector air inlet net cover to prevent dirt from entering the comb! This brilliant item can even tame your split ends and knotting to give your hair a natural lustrous look!
